title: Limits increases in maximum rent for rent-controlled apartments in New York city to two and one-half percent per annum of the previous maximum rent
summary: Limits increases in maximum rent for rent-controlled apartments in New York city to two and one-half percent per annum of the previous maximum rent.

       AN  ACT  to  amend  the  administrative code of the city of New York, in

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
